item.title: Tech Geek Children Summer Bootcamp
item.dc:creator: learn
item.content:encoded:
Homework Pakistan organises first of its kind, TECHNOLOGY GEEK SUMMER BOOTCAMP in Karachi for 8 to 14 year old students from 1st of June to 30th of June.

The bootcamp is designed to let the kids explore how the tech companies works in the corporate and global level and help them build their core concepts of information technology to expand their horizon of thinking and increase their intellectual level.

During this month-long bootcamp, kids will get familiar with the basic computing concepts including hand-held gadgets and smartphones. In the first week, they get the chance to explore their tech curiosities and learn how a normal desktop computer and home wifi works.

The second week focuses on their creative extinct and how they can use digital platforms to start their creativity on canvas. They get the chance to learn and work on Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop which are the leading graphic design softwares in the world and use their design skills to create viral social media posts for Facebook and Twitter.

In the third week, they’ll move onto the development stage where they get the chance to understand how websites and apps work over the world wide web and learn the basics of computer programming along with web development so they can set up their first online website by end of the third week.

The fourth week focuses on entrepreneurial skillset and to provide platforms to all these kids where they can utilise all the skills they have learned over the last 3 weeks and kick off their own business startup. Our business experts will mentor each student to launch a product / service and guide them through the marketing and promotional phases on their business.

Workshops will take place daily from Monday to Thursday between 11am to 2pm at the new Homework Pakistan Campus on Shahra-e-Faisal, Karachi.

 
Week 1 Gadget Week
• Concept behind Gadgets
• Insights of Computer Hardware
• Computer networking and Wifi
Week 2 Creative Week
• Introduction to Photoshop and Illustrator
• Design company branding
• Social Media Marketing
Week 3 Development Week
• Overview of World Wide Web
• Basics of computer programming
• Developing a website
Week 4 Entrepreneurial Week
• Creating a Business Idea
• Product Launch
• Marketing and Promotion

item.title: Digital Marketing
item.dc:creator: usman.haroon
item.content:encoded:
As the digital marketing landscape continues to grow at a rapid pace, marketers are faced with new challenges and opportunities within this digital age. The Digital Marketing course from Homework Pakistan is an initiative designed to educate students and professionals in the area of Digital Marketing, which is still untouched by the educational institutes in the country. This course will be covering Facebook, Google, Instagram and YouTube platforms as effective online marketing tools. The skills learned in this course will help the students to shape their strategy for the digital world competition and get the most out of their business online presence.

Prerequisite
No prior knowledge of marketing is required - just your interest and enthusiasm to learn and explore online digital marketing is enough.

Why to take this course?
  • Get higher salary by adding in-demand skill to your CV
  • Analyze online behaviours to make revenue boosting decisions
  • Learn the proven formula of how to build an online business from scratch
  • Gain confidence to implement digital marketing strategies to get ahead of your online competition.
Course Outline
  • Introduction to Marketing
  • Evolution of Marketing into Digital World
  • Effective Online Digital Marketing Strategies
  • Use of Social Media Platforms for Digital Marketing
  • Facebook Marketing
  • Instagram Marketing
  • Importance of Google Tools for Digital Marketing Strategies
  • Google Analytics
  • Google Adsense
  • Google Adwords
  • YouTube Monetisation
  • Starting your First Digital Marketing Campaign

item.title: Adobe Photoshop
item.dc:creator: huma.arshad
item.content:encoded:
This course provides you with the concepts and skills to use Adobe Photoshop effectively. You get hands-on practice working with basic and advanced techniques to get the most out of your experience. You will learn layer basics, photo retouching and image editing. Whether you are a designer, illustrator, photographer, video artist, webmaster or just a beginner, Photoshop offers you many opportunities to make your images look great.

Prerequisite
  • No prior skills are required as the course covers everything from basics
Why to take this course?
  • Create, Open and Save Documents in Photoshop
  • Customize the workspace and Tool Panels
  • Learn about tools and their use in Photoshop
  • Work with two and more documents at the same time
  • Navigate and Zoom inside the documents
  • Resize images and elements
  • Learn about File formats
  • Create, Edit and Delete Layers
  • Move elements with different methods
  • Modify the color and tonality of photos and selections
  • Learn about masking and advantages over erasing
Course Outline
  • Introduction
  • Understanding the interface
  • Opening and setting-up a document
  • Digital imaging fundamentals
  • Crop and straighten
  • Extending images
  • Adjusting image luminance
  • Adjusting colours
  • Selections
  • Basic retouching
  • The basics of layers
  • Saving your work
  • Basics of working with text
  • Speeding up your workflow with keyboard shortcuts
  • Adjusting image luminance
  • Working with colour
  • Correcting colours casts
  • Scale, rotate, skew and warp
  • Using Adobe Bridge
  • History panel
  • Selections
  • Masking
  • Retouching
  • The basics of layers
  • Basic brushes
  • Simple compositing
  • Combining images
  • Working with text
  • Settings and preferences
  • Working smarter with Bridge
  • Camera RAW
  • Retouching
  • Adjusting image luminance
  • Shadows and highlights
  • Advanced working with type
  • Working with vectors
  • Layer styles and effects
  • Using layers
  • Working with grayscale and black+white
  • Advantages of using Smart Filters
  • Selections and masking
  • Selecting with colour range
  • Sharpening
  • Noise and detail
  • Saving for the web
  • Printing and output
  • Colour settings

item.title: Adobe Illustrator
item.dc:creator: asif.shah
item.content:encoded:
Learn Illustrator from beginner to an advanced level with Homework Pakistan. This in-depth course is for designers and budding developers new to the Illustrator environment, or those that have not had formal training. You’ll produce an exciting graphic project using both the classic features and the new improved tools in Illustrator, and will finish this course with the ability to create and incorporate vector graphics for different projects. You’ll also go beyond the basics with features like filters and effects, explore more in-depth typographical adjustments, infographics and the printing process of your layouts.

Prerequisite
  • No prior skills are required as the course covers everything from basics
Why to take this course?
  • Create your very own artwork design, ready to print
  • Design your own brand including logo and stationery design
  • Design vector graphics which are resolution independent
  • Design UX interface for websites, applications and mobile platforms
Course Outline
  • Getting started
  • Navigation
  • Setting up your document
  • Making selections
  • Understanding the layers panel
  • Drawing, transforming and working with objects
  • Working with artboards
  • Working with colour
  • Alignment, distribution and spacing
  • Working with paths and the pen tool
  • Working with brushes
  • Graphic styles
  • Working with symbols
  • Introduction to infographics
  • Working with type
  • Working with images
  • Saving, printing and exporting
  • Selecting and transforming objects
  • Advancing the pen tool
  • Working with colour
  • Working with fills and strokes
  • Creating shapes
  • Adjusting appearances
  • Tracing
  • Live paint
  • Working with images
  • Drawing in perspective
  • Printing, saving and exporting
  • Infographics and dynamic data
  • Customising infographics and 3D
  • Working with brushes
  • Envelope distortions
  • Gradient tool
  • Gradient mesh
  • The blend tool
  • Warps, warp brushes and the blend tool
  • Working with type

item.title: Hair and Makeup
item.dc:creator: noor.dawood
item.content:encoded:
The beginner level classes of photography are for all who those who wants to strive in the world of photography, and urges to learn new tricks and techniques in clicking the perfect shot. Our extensive lessons will give you direction to understand the basics of photography and the importance of perfect lighting in taking pictures. How to handle the camera and the art to capture perfect picture will also be included in the session.

Prerequisite
  • No prior knowledge is required
  • No make-up products or brushes are necessary
Why to take this course?
  • Do your own make-ups professionally
  • Feel more confident in working with other women and eventually start a career as a make-up artist
  • Choose tools for make-up, take good care of them, and use them for best results
  • Use colour theory principles when choosing colours in make-up when working with different people
  • Make skin look flawless using different textures of foundations
  • Enhance highlights and shadows to create the illusion of depth on the face and create a sculpted look
Course Outline
  • Introduction
  • Professional tools
  • Work ethics
  • Colour theory
  • Skin
  • Cheeks & Contouring
  • Eyebrows
  • Eyes
  • Lips
  • Party makeup practise sessions
  • Wedding makeup practise sessions
  • Communication at a workplace
  • Managing clients and efficient scheduling
  • Project / Assignment

item.title: Content Writing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Content Writing is more like an art than a profession, the person who has this art is successful in all online businesses. It is just not only about becoming a content writer, it is about having command and grip on all the online businesses.

Prerequisite
  • All you need to know is the basics of writing the English language.
Why to take this course?
  • Learn everything you need for a fast-track start, including your first article
  • Learn the copywriter’s ‘how to’: sales copy, expert copy, and more!
  • Learn the essential skills that mark out a real pro content writer / blogger
  • Learn how to boost your income and turn your new website into a money magnet
Course Outline
  • Essentials of Writing
    • Why Become a Writer?
    • Do I have Writing Talent? It’s a Mistaken Question
    • Ways to get inspired to create content – Break through the Block
  • Before You Write
    • Introduction to Writing – Different types of information
    • Planning Your Writing
    • Guidelines to Write
    • What is a reader centric document?
    • Reading for Writing
    • Referencing and Plagiarism
  • Write Right
    • Reading for Writing
    • Writing Effective Paragraphs
    • Pre-writing
    • Effective writing
    • Communication with Subject Matter Expert
    • Grammar for Writers
    • Common Grammatical Errors
  • After You Write
    • Proof Reading
    • Editing
    • Communication with Graphic Artist
    • Rewriting
  • Publishing – Project Work
    • Writing for Web
    • Publishing – Project Work
  • Career Development for Writers
    • Professional Development Skills

item.title: Fashion Design Illustration
item.dc:creator: noor.dawood2
item.content:encoded:
In this course, students will explore fashion illustration via traditional and contemporary approaches to drawing and image creation. Contextual and conceptual ideas are explored that challenge the role of the fashion illustrator within a broader fashion context. Developing your drawing skills with new technologies, artisanal techniques and exploring visual communication skills, your illustrative stance is cultivated and nourished.

Prerequisite
  • No prior knowledge is required
Why to take this course?
  • Cover the basics of fashion illustration for a beginner to an intermediate
  • You will be equipped with the knowledge and techniques of how to draw the body elements and different fashion poses
  • Understand the proportions and difference between female, male and children figures
  • Know how to draw garments on the posing figures
  • Get feedback on your sketches!
Course Outline
  • Creating a Fashion Illustration
  • Developing your Visual Vocabulary
  • Exploring different Media and Techniques
  • Interpreting Concept and Ideas
  • Importance of keeping a Sketch Book
  • Figure Drawing
  • Drawing Methods
  • Developing a personal drawing style
  • Exploring a colour palettes
  • Portfolio Development
  • Understanding the Wider Role of Fashion Illustration

item.title: Search Engine Optimisation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
SEO is one the most highly paid online skills because of the increase in traffic and sales it can deliver to a business, and the demand for this skill is only getting bigger! By investing a small amount in this course, you'll save hundreds, if not thousands by doing SEO in-house rather than using an expensive SEO company or software. Additionally, you'll have a highly paid & In-demand skill at your fingertips if you wanted to start a home SEO Business and make monthly recurring income.

Prerequisite
  • No prior SEO knowledge is required
  • Basic internet concepts are needed e.g. websites, search engines like Google and passion to learn
Why to take this course?
  • Get higher salary by adding in-demand skill to your CV
  • Analyze online behaviours to double check your SEO strategies are working
  • Learn the proven formula of how to improve your website ranking on search engines
  • Gain confidence to implement SEO strategies to get ahead of your online competition
Course Outline
  • Picking the Best Keywords for SEO
  • Preparing Your Site, Including Avoiding Things that Hurt Your Site SEO
  • Understanding the Role of Content in SEO
  • Optimizing Your Pages – Meta Tags, Formatting Body Text & Images, etc.
  • Boosting SEO with Structured Data Markup
  • “Submitting" Your Site to Search Engines and Directories
  • Local-Search SEO
  • Understanding the Importance of Links in SEO and How they Work for You
  • Finding Places to Get Great Links to Your Site

item.title: Photography
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
The beginner level classes of photography are for all who those who wants to strive in the world of photography, and urges to learn new tricks and techniques in clicking the perfect shot. Our extensive lessons will give you direction to understand the basics of photography and the importance of perfect lighting in taking pictures. How to handle the camera and the art to capture perfect picture will also be included in the session.

Prerequisite
  • Excitement about learning photography, as you will learn best with a mind ready for action!
  • No fancy camera is required
Why to take this course?
  • Learn to take amazing photos that impress your family and friends
  • Learn how the camera truly works, so you can take better photos using manual settings
  • Learn to photograph in different scenarios like photographing kids, landscapes, panoramas, wildlife, and much more
  • Learn to edit your photos like a professional
  • Learn to compose images beautifully with basic photography rules
  • Learn to make money with photography
  • Learn to light your subjects with flash and natural lighting
  • Learn to take better photos with your smart phones
  • Learn the history of photography
Course Outline
  • Introduction to the Course
  • Understand Exposure
  • Photography Basics
  • Focus, Depth of Field & Low Light Photography
  • Composition - Shoot Better Photos
  • Creative Compositions
  • Live Demonstrations - Real & Raw Hands-On Photography
  • Quick Tips for Better Photography
  • Lighting - How to light your photos
  • Using Stabilisation - Tripods, Monopods, more?
  • Long Exposure Photography
  • Smartphone Photography - Take better photos, the selfie way!
  • Purchasing a Camera & Additional Equipment
  • Lenses - Diving deep into lens types and styles
  • Photo Editing in Lightroom
  • Photo Editing in Photoshop
  • Editing Photos in iPhoto
  • Make Money with Photography
  • Selling your Photographs - Where to sell, licensing tips, and more!
  • Wedding Photography
  • Different Brands of Cameras Overview & Settings
  • Conclusion

item.title: Microsoft Office
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This course is suitable for beginners to intermediate level users and is ideal for anyone who works, or aspires to work in a Microsoft Office environment.

Prerequisite
  • None as we would be covering everything from basics
Why to take this course?
  • Improve work efficiency with user friendly features of Ms Office that enable easy and secure information sharing
  • Gain knowledge for professional presentation of data that is compatible with most operating systems
  • Take the skills learned and apply them to everyday scenarios
  • Help you to effectively utilise all the features of Microsoft Office, and set you up for Microsoft certifications
Course Outline
  • Ms Word
    • Create and manage documents
    • Format text, paragraphs and sections
    • Create tables and lists
    • Apply references
    • Insert and format objects
  • Ms Powerpoint
    • Create and Manage Presentations
    • Insert and Format Shapes and Slides
    • Create Slide Content
    • Apply Transitions and Animations
    • Manage Multiple Presentations
  • Ms Excel
    • Create and manage worksheets and workbooks
    • Create cells and ranges
    • Create tables
    • Apply formulas and functions
    • Create charts and objects
  • Ms Outlook
    • Manage the Outlook environment
    • Manage messages
    • Manage schedules
    • Manage contacts and groups
  • Ms Access
    • Create and manage a database
    • Build tables
    • Create queries
    • Create forms
    • Create reports

item.title: WordPress Web Development
item.dc:creator: fahad.sheikh
item.content:encoded:
WordPress is the world’s best and most popular website development framework and this hands-on course takes you through from the basics, including installation and set up, to cover all the most useful features and tools WordPress offers. Whether you already have a site and want to manage it properly or are starting completely from scratch, this is the course for you.

Prerequisite
  • No prior knowledge of Wordpress is required as everything will be covered in this course.
  • Basic knowledge of HTML and CSS would be beneficial however its not compulsory.
Why to take this course?
  • Install Wordpress on your computer
  • Navigate around the Wordpress dashboard, know what everything does and how to use it.
  • Know how to configure Wordpress for best results
  • Gain the skill to create a fully functioning website using WordPress
  • Gain the knowledge and skill to sell your products and services online
  • Gain the knowledge to collect payment directly through your website.
  • Gain the skill to set up an automated system to generate and capture leads for your business!
  • Gain knowledge on the essential elements that make up a business website.
Course Outline
  • Selecting and registering a domain
  • Hosting your website
  • Understand WordPress basics
  • Installing and updating WordPress automatically
  • How to customise your WordPress dashboard
  • How to make a search engine friendly website structure
  • How to create new posts in WordPress
  • How to create new pages in WordPress
  • How to post to your website via email
  • Adding and managing users
  • How to use and format images in WordPress
  • How to add YouTube videos to posts and pages
  • How to install WordPress themes automatically
  • How to upload and install themes manually
  • How to upgrade themes automatically
  • How to customise your WordPress theme
  • How to customise the top navigation menu
  • How to create a static front page
  • How to create a sales page and buy now button
  • How to use WordPress widgets in the sidebar
  • How to install plugins automatically
  • How to upload and install plugins manually
  • How to upgrade and delete plugins automatically
  • How to integrate social media to your WordPress website
  • How to add twitter to your WordPress website
  • How to create a contact form in WordPress
  • How to customise your contact form
  • How to add a subscription form/opt-in box to gather leads and visitor information
  • How to protect your WordPress website from spammers
  • Controlling spam comments in WordPress
  • Installing and using SEO (Search Engine Optimisation) plugins
  • Simple keyword tweaks to increase your WordPress website ranking
  • How to create backups for your WordPress Website
  • How to restore a previous backup of your WordPress Website
  • How to make your WordPress website mobile friendly
  • How to track your WordPress website statistics using Google Analytics
  • Advanced WordPress theme
  • Advanced techniques to creating the website you want
  • Advanced menu bar customisation
  • Customised 404 error page
  • Widgets on certain pages
  • Advanced photo galleries
  • Create an optin box
  • Integrating autoresponders and follow up messages
  • Posting to a blog using email
  • Scheduling posts
  • Adding posts to an autoresponder
  • Creating sales pages
  • Recommended WordPress plugins
  • Creating bespoke buy now buttons
  • Creating PayPal buy now buttons
  • Creating WordPress users
  • Creating membership levels within a WordPress website
  • Adding an online shop to your website
  • WordPress website SEO
  • Advanced website statistics using Google Analytics
  • Backing up a WordPress website
  • Restoring a WordPress website backup
  • Moving a WordPress website to another domain
  • Speeding up WordPress websites
  • Get a WordPress site found by Google
  • Page speed testing
